*div1 type="summary"* *p*Green De Witt to Ramon Musquiz, May 8, 1829. Report of plans for an Indian invasion.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
[From Bexar Archives]
*p*Dear Sir, On *date_mentioned n="05-07-1829">last evening*/date_mentioned* a man by the name of *person_mentioned*Jesa McCoy */person_mentioned*who is a resident of this *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*who has been with the *person_mentioned*Comanches*/person_mentioned* for several weeks passed arrived here, and gave me the following information. He says that a few days ago, the *person_mentioned*principal chief of the Tawaccanes*/person_mentioned*, and the *person_mentioned*principal chief of the Wacoes*/person_mentioned*, called upon the*person_mentioned* head Chief of the Comanches*/person_mentioned* and solicited him to join them the *person_mentioned*Wacoes */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Tawaccanes */person_mentioned*in a general war against the *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Mexican*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*American */person_mentioned*settlements*/location_mentioned*—Saying at the same time that the *person_mentioned*Mexicans */person_mentioned*had taken from them a Caveard and the *person_mentioned*Americans */person_mentioned*had killed some of there men, and therefore they had declared war against both; He further states that the *person_mentioned*Comanches */person_mentioned*intirely refused to Join in the warfare; saying that they were now at a perfect peace with the *person_mentioned*people of this *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* and wished to remain so—.*/p*
*p*I beleave my informant to be a man of truth and that what he has stated may be relied upon.*/p*
*p*God and Liberty *location_mentioned*Gonzales */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="05-08-1829">8th May 1829*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Green DeWitt*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*His *person_mentioned*Excellency Ramon Muzquiz Chief of the Department of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*—*/p*
*/div1*
